app.title: The Toy Box by Fun Makers Studio

quest.name: Search for info
quest.description: I suddenly woke up on this misterious place. I don't know where I am. I should find someone ho can help me.

quest.name: Find the others
quest.description: I found myself lost here. I was with my friends but now I'm alone. What happened to them?

quest.name: Return to the real world
quest.description: I'm lost. I'm alone. This feels strange. The only thing I know is that I must find my way back home.

quest.name: Find a ticket
quest.description: My path is clear. I must enter that circus and for that I need a ticket. No matter what it takes to get one.

quest.name: Find what's wrong with IMP
quest.description: There's something happening behind the scenes in the circus and Imp has been saying some worring things. I should find the truth behind this circus.

node.text: Zero - Wha-? Where-? I was just-
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - … Huh? What just happened?
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: ??? - Oooh, yeah I was asking the same thing
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - What?
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Weird wizard - I said that I was asking the same thing, are you deaf??
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Weird wizard - Hehehe I was just joking kid, it's fine. Come, come, I won't bite, probably.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Weird wizard - oh this, this is- is an adventurer's dream!
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Weird wizard - A curious thing really, so strange and fun and whimsical…
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Weird wizard - Hohoho friends? Plural? That's amazing, I'm really proud of you.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - ...
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Weird wizard - ...
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - So, you know anything about the-
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Weird wizard - You're the persuasive type, aren't you? It's a bit rude, people may think you're annoying.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Weird wizard - Well, if you look hard enough, certainly, they'll be somewhere. They can't have gone far, can they?
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Weird wizard - I'm sure they're having a nice time wherever they are anyways heehee
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Weird wizard - Who am I? Ohhh that's a good one.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Weird wizard - I've been around for quite a while, I know how things work, you don't. It wouldn't be fair to send a blind man to a cave without a flashlight, right?
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - I, um… I guess…?
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Weird wizard - Yeah, keep guessing.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - I need to go
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Weird wizard - Hey, HEY, where are you going? You haven't even saved yet.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - Sav- what?
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Weird wizard - Save you the trouble of starting over, we don't want that, no no.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Weird wizard - You think I want to stand here talking to you about the same stuff over and over? I got things to do.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Weird wizard - Oh and by the way, my instincts tell me that something is eagerly waiting for you at the park.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - What are you even-
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Weird wizard - Shhhhhh my instincts can't know I told you that hehehehe
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Weird wizard - Be seeing you, Zero!
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - How do you-
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - … weird old man
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Sophie - But that's not fair! It's three against one! One of you has to join my team!
node.speaker: Sophie

node.text: Kid 1 - No, we don't
node.speaker: Sophie

node.text: Kid 2 - It's in the rules!
node.speaker: Sophie

node.text: Kid 3 - It doesn't matter how many people are in each team just that it's less than the number of fingers in the fountain.
node.speaker: Sophie

node.text: Sophie - I'll find someone and then you'll see. No-one can beat the warrior princess!!
node.speaker: Sophie

node.text: Sophie - Zero!
node.speaker: Sophie

node.text: Sophie - Zero!
node.speaker: Sophie

node.text: Sophie - Zero, Zero, Zero, Zero, can you pleeeeease come play this game with me
node.speaker: Sophie

node.text: Sophie - Those kids are being mean, they won't split so they're just all going against me and it's not FAIR
node.speaker: Sophie

node.text: Sophie - So, play!
node.speaker: Sophie

node.text: Zero - Oook, but just one round and we go find everyone else
node.speaker: Sophie

node.text: Sophie - Yay! Just one win and then we go find everyone else!
node.speaker: Sophie

node.text: Zero - Wait, that's not- *Battle start*
node.speaker: Sophie

node.text: Zero - No Sophie, we need to go find where the others are and try to go back home
node.speaker: Sophie

node.text: Sophie - Oh
node.speaker: Sophie

node.text: Sophie - Well, you do that and I'll keep playing here, See ya!
node.speaker: Sophie

node.text: Sophie - So, you'll play now?
Zero - Oook, but just one round and we go find everyone else
Sophie - Yay! Just one win and then we go find everyone else!
Zero - Wait, that's not- *Battle start*
Sophie - Well, see ya!
Sophie - Zero, I'm hungry.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - There's fruit here, let's grab some.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Sophie - Yaaay I love free stuff!
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Angry shopkeeper - HEY, YOU!! YOU DANG KIDS!! YOU CAN'T JUST TAKE THAT!! *Battle start*
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Angry shopkeeper - You think it's normal to rob an honest man AND THEN BEAT HIM UP?? I don't want to see ANY of you around here until you replace EVERYTHING you stole!!
Weird wizard - Need saving already? You guys really think you'll do THAT badly?
Weird wizard - Hehe lighten up, kids! It was a joke!
Weird wizard - Boom! Progress saved.
Zero - Well, that went great...
??? - Attention everyone! I have a great announcement for you today!
Zero - What-?
Sophie -Someone's at the plaza. Let's go!
??? - Hello my friends, it's fantastic to see all of you getting here so quickly!
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: ??? - As you all know, today we are having a show in our beloved circus. The greatest and most spectacular one yet!
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: ??? - But! That's not all, as today we're choosing a couple of lucky onlookers to join us at the show, isn't that exciting?
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: ??? - I know, I know, I, too, hate that so few of you get to join us in these extra special events. But it wouldn't be so special otherwise now, would it?
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: ??? - I wish you all the best of luck and don't forget to get your tickets, I heard we're about to run out!
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: ??? - I hope to see you all later in the show
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Sophie - We HAVE to go there
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - I don't know, we should be looking for the others now
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Sophie - Please, please, pleaaaase! It'll be so much fun!
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - I-
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: ??? - Well, you two look new here
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Sophie - You're the one that was talking in the plaza! See Zero, they're talking to us, now we HAVE to go to the show
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: ??? - You sure do it's the best around here!
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - Where are my manners, I'm Imp, a pleasure to meet both of you
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - I'm Zero and the loud one is my little sister Sophie
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Sophie - HEY!
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - Loud and tiny!
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - Pff
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - If you don't mind me asking. Where did you come from? It's not every day we get new people here
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - We're from the real world, outside of the box
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - So, I *was* right, You're human too
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - Oh just, you know, around. From outside, the forest and stuff
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Sophie - Yeah, we bite! Grrr
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - Pff. Sure, sure
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - You're definitely from outside… Out of the Toy Box that is
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - I- We- no.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - I- We- no.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - Don't worry, I won't tell. We humans should look out for each other in here
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Sophie - Wait, you're not a toy?
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - Do I really look that bad?
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - To be honest, I'm not quite… sure, anymore, it's been a long while and being here… it changes you.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - But, yes, I came from the real world too
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - If you want, maybe I can help you with some stuff, surely you have questions
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - We weren't alone, before we got here, we had three friends with us. Do you have any idea where they could be?
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - Well, they're not in the circus, I can tell you that for sure.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - I've heard some rumors, about how the Toy Box is much, much bigger than what I know of it.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - Other… sections of the world and ways to get there. That wizard talks about them sometimes, portals or something similar I've never seen one, so it could only be down in...
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - Nevermind.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - You have any idea how to get out if this place?
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - No clue, take any direction and go straight, you won't find an end and when you turn back, the town is right there, never far.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - Maybe there's something at…
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - No... Forget it.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - You said being here changes you. Is it like, an amount of time or… what did you mean by that?
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - Ah, yeah, no it's not time, it'd be too… predictable I guess?
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - No, sometimes, things happen. You take something, you make a deal, you die
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - You can come back from those but, you're not the same
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - Don't worry too much about it, it's not as bad as it sounds
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Sophie - So, about those tickets?
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - oh, I don't th- I don- I-
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - ...
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - I don't have tickets with me at the moment dear, but if you get some I will make sure you get the *best* seats to see our wonderful show.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - I have to go now, duty calls. Until next time
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - That was… something
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Sophie - What are we waiting for? Let's get those tickets!!!
node.speaker: Tumama

Clown - Sold out
Zero - But we just-
Clown - Sold out
Zero - Guess we're not seeing the show. Sorry Sophie.
Sophie - No, we're going. I have an idea. Let's go talk with the toys still out here
Zero - Hello, two tickets for t-
Clown - Sold out
Zero - But we just-
Clown - Sold out
Zero - Guess we're not seeing the show. Sorry Sophie.
Sophie - No, we're going. I have an idea. Let's go talk with the toys still out here
Shopkeeper - Wow wow wow. What are you trying to do there you rascal
Zero - Nothing! We're going now
Zero - Nice day we're having.
Doll - Yes, an amazing day. I got so much done!
Sophie - No ticket.
Zero - It's impressive how many people want to go to the circus, right?
Doll - Bah, it's like this every week. But I never get in so what's the point.
Sophie - Nothing.
Zero - Nice day we're having.
Doll - Yes! and such a great show to go to now
Sophie - Bingo!
Zero - Yeah, definitely gonna be great to see.
Zero - Anyway, see ya!
Sophie - WE HAVE TICKETS!
Imp - You made it. I didn't think you'd be able to get tickets.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Zero - Yeah… we managed.
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - Well, since you're here. Go as high in the benches as you can you'll get the best view
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - And no matter what *no volunteering*
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - I- *cough* *cough*
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - ...
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - I have to go now, enjoy the show dearies!
node.speaker: Tumama

node.text: Imp - LADIES AND GENTLEMEN, WELCOME TO…
Imp - I hope all of you enjoyed and an extra round of applause for our newest additions
Imp - We'll see you again in our next show and remember. The show is never over as long as we keep the connection
Zero - Well… A bit creepy, but kinda fun. What did you think, Sophie?
Sophie - I have developed an irrational fear of puppets now!!!
Weird wizard - Yeah, I don't blame you, I have never made it past half time.
Zero - Oh, it's you… again.
Weird wizard - Yeah, I missed you too, please hold back the excitement, jeez.
Sophie - What's the matter, funny wizard man?
Weird wizard - First of all, I have no idea what about me you'd ever find funny.
Weird wizard - Secondly, how about that Jester fella, huh?
Zero - You mean Imp?
Weird wizard - Yeah, that's the one! And you know their name, too!
Weird wizard - I always had a hunch you'd get along, huhuhu.
Sophie - They were saying some weird stuff about death and portals and circus tickets.
Weird wizard - Yeah, weeeeeiiiiiird.

option.text: They also said you might know something about that
Is Imp ok? They seemed concerned

node.text: Zero - They also said you might know something about that.
Weird wizard - I might or might not.
Weird wizard - Bot outright telling you would kinda ruin the fun, wouldn't it?
Weird wizard - And even if I did know.
Weird wizard - I'm sure you kids wouldn't want to miss the satisfaction of solving a puzzle by yourselves, hehe…
Zero - But what about the other worlds that Imp mentioned?
Weird wizard - I don't know, ask Imp about it.
Zero - But-
Weird wizard - It's cool, I don't think they would mind.

option.text: Is Imp ok? They seemed concerned

node.text: Zero - Is Imp ok? They seemed concerned.
Weird wizard - Oh, they've always been the theatrical type.
Weird wizard - Working on stage ends up making a drama queen out of you.
Sophie - Yeah, that IS true.
Weird wizard - Also, between you and me, you should keep an eye out.
Zero - Why?
Weird wizard - This circus may not be what it seems.

option.text: They also said you might know something about that

node.text: Zero - Well, we have to go.
Weird wizard - Best of luck, then!
Sophie - Thanks, mister wizard!
Zero - ...
Sophie - ...
Zero - We should sneak in. See what's wrong with Imp
Sophie - Yay!!! Crime!!
Zero - I don't know if it's more or less creepy with the puppets.
Sophie - I think both are more.
Color with color in front on each other, gives us a path when in the right order
Sophie - That's a lot of mirrors.
Cast member - Hey! Cast members only.
Imp - What are you doing here!?
Sophie - Zero was worried there was something wrong with you.
Imp - You shouldn't be here, the circus doesn't appreciate intruders.
Imp - But maybe you could join us here! Tangled like a puppe-
Imp - NO. Get out, surely there's a nice place in the town where you can stay. I heard the inn isn't too expensive.

option.text: But we came here to help you

node.text: Zero - But we came here to help you!
Sophie - Yeah, we only want to help.
Imp - You CAN'T help me, I'm in too deep already.
Imp - You being here will only make everything worse.
Imp - It's ALREADY making it worse.
Imp - Save yourselves and hope no one noticed you here.
Imp - Unless you wanted to joi-
Imp - NO NO NO
Zero - What about our friends? They're out there! Probably alone. Shouldn't we try to get to them?
Imp - They'll be fine wherever they are. Or not, is not like you can do anything except slow the process
Imp - You could make it go faster-
Imp - Stop stop STOP.
Sophie - Imp, you're scaring me.
Imp - I- sorry, dear...

option.text: But we came here to help you!

node.text: Zero - What about getting out? Didn't you want to try too? You said there is nowhere to go from out there.
Zero - We need to go deeper to get back home.
Imp - Yes, but it's too d-
Imp - It'd be perfect for-
Imp - I want to-
Imp - I can't-
Imp - AAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH
Imp - There
Imp - The door is open.
Sophie - Thank you.
Imp - I hope you too can get out.
Imp - I'm about to be in so much trouble.
Weird wizard - Shoo shoo, they're not ready in there yet.
Weird wizard - Go now.
Weird wizard - Shoo!
